G

GamePanel - Class in view
Represents the main panel on which everything in the window is displayed
GamePanel(Board) - Constructor for class view.GamePanel
Constructs a new panel to place in the game window.
GameWindow - Class in view
Represents the window containing all the game's componenents
GameWindow(Board) - Constructor for class view.GameWindow
Constructs the window on which game is to be played.
getBoard() - Method in class view.GameWindow
Returns the board which will be played
getBoardDisplay() - Method in class view.GamePanel
Returns the visual gameboard in the panel
getCellsWithMines() - Method in class model.Board
Returns the set of all cells that have mines.
getColor() - Method in class view.CellDisplay
Returns the cell's color on the screen
getCorrBoard() - Method in class view.BoardDisplay
Returns the corresponding Board that goes with this
getCorrCell() - Method in class view.CellDisplay
Returns the corresponding cell that goes with this visual representation
getFlaggedCells() - Method in class model.Board
Returns the set of all cells that have been flagged.
getGrid() - Method in class model.Board
Returns the grid associated with this board
getGrid() - Method in class view.BoardDisplay
Returns the grid of cell representations
getLoc() - Method in class model.Cell
Returns the location of this cell in grid coordinates as an array.
getLP() - Method in class view.GamePanel
Returns the panel on the bottom which displays how many mines are left to be found
getMinesLeft() - Method in class model.Board
Returns the number of mines left on the board.
getNumMinesAround() - Method in class model.Cell
Returns the number of mines surrounding this cell.
getPanel() - Method in class view.GameWindow
Returns the main panel on which everything is laid out
